title: Zyra Ultimate Skin Idea
body:
\*Drops some Riot KateyKhaos bait*

Came across this post by Kyra101 on redditt


"So Ultimate skins normally have a champion with many variations put into one skin. Like Udyr with 4 stances and Sona being able to change into 3 different forms. Well my idea for Zyra's ultimate skin is that she has 4 forms that have to do with the 4 seasons in nature. (Spring, Summer, Autumn/Fall, and Winter). Much like Sona's ultimate skin Zyra can change her form whenever she wants while she is not in combat. Zyra's appearance and particle effects for each seasonal form will have colors that go with that form; Spring: reds, greenish yellows, greens, pinks, light purples Summer: yellows, dark greens Autumn: browns, oranges, dark purples, blacks Winter: white, grey, light and dark blues

Also, Zyra's model and spell effects will NOT be the same for each form and just recolored, but each form will have different appearances.

This is my idea I have for a Zyra ultimate skin. Please give me some feedback if you think this sounds cool, would be a good idea, or just needs some tweaking. Would love to everyone's ideas to help make this better."

Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/zyramains/comments/4cj92t/zyra_ultiamte_skin_idea/


Here are some examples of potential plant changes with the season:

Spring:


http://digitalresult.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/summer-flowers-wallpapers-38.jpeg







Summer:

http://www.hdwallpapers.in/walls/gorgeous_sunflowers-wide.jpg





Autumn:

http://www.jannelsonlandscapedesign.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/images/Rudbeckia-Cherry-Brandy.jpg




Winter:


http://www.hdwallpr.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/winter-high-definition-winter-flowers-050310271.jpg

replies.body:
Woah, okay, this is pretty rad. 

So, if we were to do something like this, I'm thinking you start off as a season, and as you level your ultimate (6, 11, 18), you swap seasons as the game goes on. (We may be able to do it based on the time of game, too?) If she did it based on leveling the ult, we could do a model swap for each, which shouldn't be crazy, 'cause we've done something similar with PFE. I wonder how we'd swap all the plants out, haha. I'm sure it could be done, though with a little work on our side. 

As someone who grew up in New England, I would be a huge fan of having some kind of autumn form, and it'd likely be my favorite form. :P

If it'd be based on leveling ult, I'd think it'd make more sense to go backward; winter, then autumn at 6, then summer at 11, then spring at 16.

I mean, would it make much sense for a plant based champ to be at their strongest during winter?

Aha, that's a really interesting point.  I'm thinking more linear terms, but this is also something we'd certainly consider. 

If this were the case, I feel like summer may be the strongest, but I'm not sure how that'd work out in terms of starting point/ending point.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xkV06UJg,comment-id=000100020000,timestamp=2016-04-05T22:17:26.627+0000)
>
> Aha, that's a really interesting point.  I'm thinking more linear terms, but this is also something we'd certainly consider. 
> 
> If this were the case, I feel like summer may be the strongest, but I'm not sure how that'd work out in terms of starting point/ending point.

Hi, I had an idea!

You start off the game in Spring Mode. This skin would transition based on a sort of stack system based on how many seeds she's planted. The more seeds she plants, the more the Spring skin flowers. This could be from like 0 to 10 seeds planted the transition. Then she would slowly transition into autumn with leaves progressively falling off her and her plants. Then from there it would transition into winter, with a frost effect and so on. After that it could transition back into spring with buds and leaves growing.

A quick summary:

0 Seeds planted - Spring
0 - 10 Seeds planted - Zyra and her plants begin to flower
10 - 20 Seeds planted -  Zyra and her plant's leaves change colours
20 - 30 Seeds planted - Zyra and her plant's leaves start falling off as a frosty effect begins
30 - 40 Seeds planted - The frost slowly dissipates and buds begin to form on Zyra and her plants, which turn into leaves.

I really love Zyra but currently none of the skins really connect with me. Other champions all have at least 1 or 2 cool skins, but I feel for Zyra currently her base skin is the only one I like. An ultimate skin such as this would truly be awesome!

Okay, I can get behind this. This is a really cool way to go about it. After you hit 40, what would happen after? Would you cycle back around to spring again? Would she reach some like, final season form? :D
Why do you comment so much on this post? You are giving me hope :C
I'm really interested in people's thought processes here, and it gives everyone a bit of insight as to how we plan larger projects and how we think!

As a Zyra enthusiast, if Riot made a "Four Seasons Zyra" Ultimate Skin, I will buy it instantly and never ask for another Zyra skin ever again. :P It is literally the best potential skin that Zyra could have.

haha, I hadn't really brainstormed what an ultimate season form would look like. I think it could also work well if it just cycled around. I think it should roughly take like ~30-40 minutes to complete a cycle.

Perhaps each stage of her ult could add certain particles/effects to each season. Like in spring/summer it would increase the number of flowers on her and her plants. Maybe Zyra and her plants could appear to grow or morph a bit as such upgrades each her ults. 

I know she's one of the most complex champion models with all of her forms and plants, so an ultimate skin for her would be a great deal of effort. But I think that also means there are so many more possibilities for her I think :)

> I know she's one of the most complex champion models with all of her forms and plants, so an ultimate skin for her would be a great deal of effort. But I think that also means there are so many more possibilities for her I think :)

All of this, haha. 

The hardest part is making sure that if we did an ultimate for Zyra, her file size isn't gigantic. With a lot of models doing all kinds of crazy things, it may be more difficult. Particles on the model may make it a bit easier, like you said, some kind of particles or effects to each season. 

>  Maybe Zyra and her plants could appear to grow or morph a bit as such upgrades each her ults.

I actually like this idea alot. It's similar to what we did with PFE upgrading his armor when he leveled his ult, so it's not out of the realm of possibility, and something I think would look really cool if executed properly. 

> I think it should roughly take like ~30-40 minutes to complete a cycle.

The reason I suggested 20 was because that way, you'd be guaranteed to see all four forms before a surrender. :P that said, we could also do it so all cycles complete once you hit 18, which would move off the idea of evolving off the ultimate. 

SO. MANY. COOL. OPTIONS.

So uh with multiple season and such.. 


What would her splash art look like :X

She would need a form that particularly stands out from the rest. Is that why you brought up the "final form" Katey?

> I actually like this idea alot. It's similar to what we did with PFE upgrading his armor when he leveled his ult, so it's not out of the realm of possibility, and something I think would look really cool if executed properly.

I based a bit of my idea off of Pulsefire Ezreal in terms of the upgrading and such. I feel like for Zyra's splash if you went with the seasonal theme it would be somewhat reminiscent of DJ Sona/Udyr/PFE. Here's an example:

Season Zyra Skin Splash (4 splashes). It would basically Zyra with her Thorn Splitter and Vine Lasher plants beside her. Possibly in the setting of a ruined town or city, long forgotten and overgrown with vines and nature. The setting and the positioning of Zyra and her plans remains the same in each splash.

* Spring - Zyra and her plants bud and grow leaves

* Summer - Zyra and her plants flower and bask in the sun

* Autumn - Zyra and her plants change colours and lose a few leaves

* Winter - Zyra and her plants have no leaves. Wintery landscape, with Zyra and her plants frosted

The animated splash would transition through the seasons in a loop. Alternatively, if that would be too intensive you could have each season be a loop on its own.

In terms of a final form, if you compare it to Pulsefire Ezreal, it could be as simple as more details and particles being added to each of her seasonal forms as she progressively upgrades her ultimate

> The animated splash would transition through the seasons in a loop. Alternatively, if that would be too intensive you could have each season be a loop on its own.

I love, love, love this idea.
That's partially why I thought a final form could be cool, just to tie everything together.

Personally, I would vote for cycling back around into spring again. As a zyra main, I like the idea of having the choice to switch between the seasons and appreciate the skin throughout the game. 

Also, this would prevent you from not seeing your full skin if the game ended before you hit 16. This isn't common, but with shorter games and surrendering after stomps being the norm, it could definitely happen every couple of games.
Right, I think something either cycling or doing a full circle by 20 minutes may be optimal, if the idea of swapping each form whenever is out of the question due to size limitations.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=xkV06UJg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-05T21:40:33.783+0000)
>
> Woah, okay, this is pretty rad. 
> 
> So, if we were to do something like this, I'm thinking you start off as a season, and as you level your ultimate (6, 11, 18), you swap seasons as the game goes on. (We may be able to do it based on the time of game, too?) If she did it based on leveling the ult, we could do a model swap for each, which shouldn't be crazy, 'cause we've done something similar with PFE. I wonder how we'd swap all the plants out, haha. I'm sure it could be done, though with a little work on our side. 
> 
> As someone who grew up in New England, I would be a huge fan of having some kind of autumn form, and it'd likely be my favorite form. :P

What if you made it toggleable, like Sona's music, with Ctrl+5 or whatever it was?

I'm not super techy, so bear with me! 

It would depend on how the models for her plants would swap out. Champion models are fairly easy, but she also has models that interact with each other with her skills.

The other issue is, the content would need to stream and not be loaded into the game all at once, so that'd be something to keep in mind. Reason being, if we're loading in 4 Zyra's into a game at once, that's 3 extra champions, and it's something that lower spec computers may not be able to handle too easily. :P (Sona's music streamed, so it make it a bit easier for lower spec machines to handle!) Oh, and picture something like this in Hexakill for lower spec machines - probably not fun. D:

That said, swapping out let's say 9 models 'cause that's what Haunted Zyra has, and this would likely be as complex, if not more, it could cause a bit of lag if you're swapping whenever you'd like.

Thanks for the reply Katey :]

As someone who grew up in the southwestern US, I would love to actually see what Autumn looks like haha


Like others have stated, the current Zyra skins just don't "do it" for me. I feel like this seasonal theme just amplifies everything about her to an ultimate level. The flowers in different seasons give you guys a lot of cool ideas to work with I think aswell. 

In the end, I am such a huge Zyra fan. I play her almost exclusively in ranked and want her to get some skin love asap. Figured since she is getting a small VU in the mid-year update, now is a better time than ever to start a discussion :D

ty again Miss Khaos

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

Hi hi! 

Thanks for posting something that has a ton of potential for talking and brainstorming. I really love this idea, and there has been some amazing suggestions in this thread.

I use Haunted Zyra, but that's because I love the plants. :P I agree that having something that's on the opposite end of the spectrum in terms of skins would be amazing for her. ^-^ 

Lastly, I'm glad to see you appreciate the foliage, even if you aren't in the area to see it. (IT IS SO PRETTY, THAT IS WHY I AM GETTING MARRIED IN IT.)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

Welcome to the world of skin ideation. :D 

Okay, so my personal thoughts would be - 

> Would the seasons be cyclical, or would they change gradually over the course of the game? (assuming this is done based on game time)

If based on game time, I would like to see seasons swap gradually throughout the game, just like seasons do throughout the year. Maybe have them all show by 20 minutes, and then have them start over?

> What if somebody really likes one season over the others, wouldn't it suck if that person only experiences his/her favorite season at only one part of the game?

I mentioned a bit above about toggling and some of the challenges there. D:

> Also, winter. Winter themed skins are a thing, and this skin will obviously overlap. Would this mean Zyra would NOT be a candidate for future Winter skins?

Potentially, but it would depend on the final execution of the season w. what we would do for a normal winter thematic. :)

IMO it should be cycled with Game Time. That way, all the current Ultimate skins will change form in their own unique ways.

* Pulsfire Ezreal changes with levels.

* Spirit Guard Udyr changes with abilities.

* DJ Sona changes with a toggle.

* Four Seasons Zyra changes with game time.

I mean, I know it can suck that a person can't always see their favourite form, but an SG-Udyr player isn't always gonna see their favourite Tiger form when they need to max Phoenix. I don't think it will be much of an issue for Zyra players overall.

I think that's a cool idea, having a different method for changing for each ultimate skin. I agree that while you may not see your favorite form each game, it's a cool mechanic to have. I think even using Kha'Zix as an example works here - you may not need to evolve x form, so you may not see every version of the full form, but there are instances where you *will* see it.

I think that if you make Zyra's forms cycle through in a 20 minute period, you should have Summer and Winter be off by a minute. Since in real time Summer is longer during the day (Plus one Minute), and Winter is Shorter during the day (Minus one Minute). Which one mean that the times are
          
                   *  Spring | Minutes 0 - 4:59
                   *  Summer | Minutes 5:00 - 10:59
                   *  Autumn | Minutes 11:00 - 15:59
                   *  Winter | Minutes 16:00 - 19:59

And then the season would start to cycle back through starting at minute 20, and the cycle period would last in 20 minute increments.
Oooh, that's a really cool idea. I like how you synced this up to real time. ^-^

I've never been fond of "Season Zyra" as an Idea for an ultimate, I'd really like an original theme instead

But the idea of making it cycle with time and then restart, like real seasons is really cool
Did you have something else in mind? :3

As someone who grew up in florida, what are these season things you yankees are always talking about?  We only have two climate variations down here: warmer/wetter and cooler/drier.  Autumn doesn't really make sense to me.

Autumn is honestly, just all the plants dying. D: In New England, it's awesome because all of the green leaves from maple trees, etc, turn these pretty orange/yellow/red colors. :3 It's also basically hoodie weather.

The seasons in my state are:

Ice Storm
http://www.urbanforestrysouth.org/administrative-tools/site-images/2007%20OU%20Ice%20Storm%20(400).jpg

Tornado
http://i2.cdn.turner.com/cnnnext/dam/assets/140519202741-01-moore-oklahoma-then-horizontal-large-gallery.jpg

Drought
http://stateimpact.npr.org/oklahoma/files/2013/02/lake-hefner.jpg

Flood
http://cdn.onlyinyourstate.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ok60-flood-700x466.jpg
i know Oklahoma when i see it
Everybody thinks their state has the worst weather. Oklahoma actually does. Bad weather and teen pregnancy are the only things we're "good" at.
http://i.imgur.com/fbzUm1t.jpg

We should ask for a Natural Disaster skin line. 

-Oklahoma Janna (aka F6 Janna)
-Mount St. Helen Malphite
-Highwater Zac
-Gale Force Galio
-Dust Bowl Zyra (tumbleweeds)
-Unabomber Ziggs
-DC Jhin/Caitlyn

No? Too soon?

I didn't see this exact idea pitched so i apologize to anyone who mat have already commented it.  Would it be easier or more viable to have the seasons change similar to udyr and kha'zix?

Similar to spirit guard udyr, when you use an ability the season changes.
EX: Q-particle effect like how udyr has the spirit appear briefly, then zyra changes to a Spring form.
W- Particle effect and changes to summer
and so on.
Then when she ults, divide the large circle into 4 different sections. One for each season which have smooth visual transitions between the 4 sections.

Or/And...
When the ult is leveled up you choose one of the for abilities corresponding to the seasons to receive added visual effects.

> Would it be easier or more viable to have the seasons change similar to udyr and kha'zix?

Potentially. IMO, the hardest part would be getting all of her models to change successfully, and for lower spec machines to be able to handle that as well. For example, Haunted Zyra has nine models. 

> Or/And...
When the ult is leveled up you choose one of the for abilities corresponding to the seasons to receive added visual effects.

That's a cool concept. ^-^ Could be a bit easier to add some particles on top of existing models. I think that'd be cooler, too. :D
Can you elaborate on why a skin for Zyra is so difficult? How does her haunted Zyra have 9 different models?

Zyra is currently difficult due to all of the models, as well as how they interact with each other. 

Haunted Zyra has -

* Base model
* Tomb model for her (Q)
* Seeds for her (W)
* Vine for her (E)
* Ultimate tomb and vines in the AoE
* Empowered seeds (planting a seed and then using E over it)
* Empowered seeds( planting a seed and then using Q over it)
* Empowered ultimate seeds (they actually grow)
* Recall chair prop

One Question. On Zyra´s promopage for the MYMU her E is redish-pink. Maddy already confirmed that the green textures on PBE  are the intended ones. But, since you have the redish art assets ready and finished, can you replace the E of SKT Zyra with them?

Good question. I can poke Champion Update about it. :)

EDIT: Since they're just texture updates, it should apply to SKT as well. He's gonna check to make sure that's the case!

If you did not understand me correctly:

Zyra´s E on her promopage are redish-pink:

https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/mid-season-magic/en_US/0e112a2df51e7aa4804ce4edc7c8d3eb61218687/assets/video/champion-abilities/zyra/Zyra_E.webm

On PBE her E is green (intended). My Question was, since we got the art assets of a redish-pink E ready, can we give it to SKT Zyra, whose E is green as well?

Oh! I see what you're saying. 

In this case, no. Whatever the base uses is what SKT Zyra is going to be using, as they share the same assets because SKT Zyra is a 750 RP skin.

B-But.. correct me if I'm wrong ~~because I usually am~~ but isn't Warden Nautilus a 750 RP skin as well? It has different textures on the shield so why can't Zyra get something that fits her SKT skin better when you already have the assets?

Correct, he is. In that case, his base shields clashed with the new theme, so that was a quality of life update. In this case, the base plants, we feel, are fine with this skin, as SKT is basically base Zyra in an SKT outfit.
Massachusetts represent! :D

Maybe you can decide which form you'll be in, like DJ Sona
{{summoner:31}}

OMG my post actually got recognized by a rioter. I'm like dying on the inside. Thank you Chortle for posting this on the boards. Please let this skin happen KateyKhaos it would mean so much to me and a lot of Zyra mains.

https://38.media.tumblr.com/904bbc02af503e6dddbaf483b5ef3dc9/tumblr_nbjz4nyhJq1tvhfueo1_500.gif

Hey, it's a really cool idea. Definitely something to keep in mind. ^-^
